explains: n. 混乱，无秩序状态；混沌
wordGroup: chaos and confusion 混乱与浑沌
deterministic chaos [数]决定性混沌；命定混沌（等于chaos）

sentences.en: Fighting had broken out and all was chaos and confusion.
sentences.cn: 战斗爆发了，一切都陷入了混乱不堪的状态。

sentences.en: The situation was described by one insider as 'absolute chaos'.
sentences.cn: 据一名内部人士说，实情是乱作一团。

sentences.en: He was ultimately overthrown and the country descended into chaos.
sentences.cn: 他最终被推翻，国家陷入了混乱。
